Html:
Hello,

 

Where can I download the MicrosoftPracticesProjectLinker.msi file?  I do not see it in the Oct 2009 release of CAL or anywhere on CodePlex.

 

Thanks,
John

Hi John,

You can download the Project Linker tool from here. Take into account that the latest release of the tool is from the February release (the Project Linker was not updated in October), so the “MicrosoftPracticesProjectLinkerFeb2009.msi” option is the one you are seeking for.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
